txt.en: The dissenters who separated from the party going to Helm's Deep can likely be found in Marton in the Westfold.\n\nYou should search for the dissenters who separated from Agelwyn's party.
This lady was firm in her disagreement with Agelwyn's decision. Little did she know that it would end this way.
This lady was firm in her disagreement with Agelwyn's decision. Little did she know that it would end this way.
Egelnoth is somewhere in Marton.\n\nYou should search for Egelnoth.
Brash folly motivated this man to choose fighting for a lost home over his own life.
Egelnoth evidently only wished to return to salvage his lost riches. Here they lie, untouched after his death.
Search for those who went to Marton rather than follow Agelwyn ([placeholder]/[placeholder])

You have discovered a bitter scene in Marton -- the death of those who defied the wisdom of their Thane. Rather than help the few survivors reach Helm's Deep, they flocked proudly to their untimely deaths.
The dissenters from Marton have not been heard from since they parted ways from Agelwyn, and the new Thane wishes to know what became of her people.

'I have one last favour to ask of you, [placeholder]. I know the remainder of my people and I did not part on the best of terms. I wish to know how Egelnoth and the others fared when they went back to Marton.\n\n'Will you search for them there? Be careful, dear friend. The enemy is strong.'
You have discovered a bitter scene in Marton -- the death of those who defied the wisdom of their Thane.
This poor woman never had a chance. Her stubbornness led her to this fate.
